307a1f1ee03d6c9b96eeccc66f68d5d48474ea1a.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to 0... | tools:11

response.content: Morning, stranger! I’m Marta Hearthwood—welcome to Thornhaven. If you need a warm drink or a quick story about the town, I’ve got plenty to share.
